#define GetWINDOW ( obj,
winp   ) 
Value:
do {\
    if (!OBJ_TAINTED(obj) && rb_safe_level() >= 4)\
        rb_raise(rb_eSecurityError, "Insecure: operation on untainted window");\
    Data_Get_Struct((obj), struct windata, (winp));\
    if ((winp)->window == 0) no_window();\
} while (0)
